data.description: This game you can have fun with your friends and beat each levels which I will be working as hard and frequently as I can to get new levels posted. You run around with your hands and get good exercise lol. Download and have fun.

changelog.change_log: New sandbox gamemode, worked really hard to get this out as soon as i could, it was recommended lol, its really good so yea. have fun :)
Bug fixes (including vents and boosters) +new game mode+ new areas added in free roam horror. Have fun :)
Bug fixes, new game mode, new areas added to free roam horror. Have fun :)
New horror mode!!!! It is super sigma and lit, i worked really hard to get this out so please sub and leave a review! Have fun :)
Bug fixes+lava pvp fix+gliches fixed. Have fun!

New update, New cosmetic, A lot of bug fixes, and lag fixed. Please leave a review and sub to my youtube, you dont know how much it helps me. I am working my very hardest to get new updates out which requires a lot of work, energy, and time, so please do this, it motivates me more. Have fun!

Bunch of bug fixes, +fixed lag, please leave a review and sub to my youtube, it helps me out a lot and as i am trying my hardest to get updates out as fast as a can which takes a lot of work. Have fun:)
New update!!! New game mode?? Idk join and see. Please leave a review and sub to me youtube as it helps me out so much and I am putting in so much work to get new updates out. Have fun :)

New update! A lot of bug fixes, changed a bit on only up, and something else i don't want to give away, so see for yourself. Please leave a review on fatal halls, and subscribe to my youtube, it helps me out very much. Thank you, have fun! :)

New update! A lot of bug fixes, changed a bit on only up, and something else i don't want to give away, so see for yourself. Please leave a review on fatal halls, and subscribe to my youtube, it helps me out very much. Thank you, have fun! :)

New update! A lot of bug fixes, changed a bit on only up, and something else i don't want to give away, so see for yourself. Please leave a review on fatal halls, and subscribe to my youtube, it helps me out very much. Thank you, have fun! :)

Sorry for bugs last update, Im pretty sure I fixed them. Controller vibrations and slippery hands are fixed, level 3 is out! As you know I am working my hardest to get new updates out so it would help me so much if you subscribed to my youtube, and left a review on Fatal Halls. Thank you, Have Fun :)
Lev 3 is released! I working on getting updates out as frequent as I can, I am working very hard to get them out, so please sub to my youtube, and leave a review on my game, thank you :). Have Fun!

Bug fixes, and new cosmetic, i'm currently working on level 3, and am trying to get updates out as fast as I can. Please subscribe to my youtube and leave a review on fatal halls, you don't know how much it helps me, thank you.  Have Fun :)

Bug Fixes, New difficulty, I'm tired so no more updates for me till a few days because it will take a while to get level 3 done. Im working my hardest on it and trying to get new updates out, so please leave a review and sub to my youtube as it helps me out so much. Have fun:)

Bug fixes, Fixed lag and hand animations. Next update will be Level 3. I am working my hardest to work on it and get new updates out, please leave a review it really helps me out, and go sub to my youtube. Have fun!
Fixed version I swear, sorta lol, Only up is out! Join to play, also I am  working on new levels as frequent as I can. Have Fun :)
New Update! Join now cuz i don't want to give any spoilers. Have Fun! I am working on new levels as frequent as I can.
Bug fixes, Working on new stuff join discord to get leeks on the new things we are adding. Working my hardest to get new updates out. Have fun :)
Bug fixes, Working on new stuff join discord to get leeks on the new things we are adding. Working my hardest to get new updates out. Have fun :)
